properties.name: anchor-point
properties.description: Used for adjusting InfoWindow which is opened onto marker.

properties.name: cross-on-drag
properties.description: Whether cross appears when marker is being dragged.

properties.name: draggable
properties.description: Whether marker can be dragged or not.

properties.name: cursor
properties.description: Cursor when mouse moves over marker.

properties.name: shape
properties.description: Shape of marker. Identify area where marker receives events.

properties.name: visible
properties.description: Whether marker is visible or not.

events.name: click
events.description: Raised when user clicks on marker.

events.name: double-click
events.description: Raised when user double clicks on marker.

events.name: right-click
events.description: Raised when user right clicks on marker.

events.name: drag-start
events.description: Raised when user starts dragging marker.

events.name: drag
events.description: Raised when user is dragging marker.

events.name: drag-end
events.description: Raised when user finishes dragging marker.

events.name: mouse-over
events.description: Raised when mouse moves over map.

events.name: mouse-out
events.description: Raised when mouse moves from map to its outside.

events.name: mouse-down
events.description: Raised when mouse is held down on marker.

events.name: mouse-up
events.description: Raised when mouse is released from marker.
